element.name: OtherCodeList
element.desc: List of other codes or strings that crosswalk to or serve as translations of the Code element. If Code changes and OtherCode elements are supported, both Code and all associated OtherCode elements must be present.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: The date on which the disciplinary action begins.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: The date through which the disciplinary action is in effect, inclusive.

element.name: Duration
element.desc: Identifies the length, in school days, of the disciplinary action. Note: decimal places may be used for fractions of school days.

element.name: ZeroTolerance
element.desc: Identifies whether or not this action taken against a student was imposed as a consequence of state or local zero tolerance policies.

element.name: FullYearExpulsion
element.desc: Identifies whether or not the action involved an expulsion with or without services for a period of one full year (i.e., 365 days).

element.name: ShortenedExpulsion
element.desc: Identifies whether or not the action involved an expulsion with or without services that is shortened to a term of less than one year by the superintendent or chief administrator of a school district.

element.name: PoliceNotification
element.desc: Identifies whether or not the offender's action included notification of local law enforcement, regardless of whether official action was taken.

element.name: Arrest
element.desc: Identifies whether or not the offender was arrested.

element.name: AlternativeEducation
element.desc: Identifies whether or not the offender was assigned to an Alternative Education facility.

element.name: CountsTowardAttendance
element.desc: Designates whether this date should be counted toward administrator attendance.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: The name of the SIF object to which the GUID relates.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: This attribute specifies what type of alert message this is.

element.name: AlertMessage
element.desc: This is an alert message that is associated with the student.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this AttendanceCodeInfo entity.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the attendance code is used.

element.name: AttendanceCode
element.desc: Locally defined code for attendance.

element.name: AttendanceType
element.desc: Type of attendance code.

element.name: AttendanceStatus
element.desc: Excused status of the attendance code.

element.name: Description
element.desc: The text description of the attendance code.

element.name: AbsenceValue
element.desc: The amoung of absense represented by AttendanceCode, up to trhee decimal places

element.name: UsedForDailyAttendance
element.desc: Is this attendance code used for daily attendance?

element.name: UsedForPeriodAttendance
element.desc: Is this attendance code used for period attendance?

object.name: BellPeriod
object.desc: An entry for each unique bell period for the bell schedule

element.name: TimetableDayIdentifier
element.desc: The unique identifier for the timetable day used for the bell period (from a TimetableDayList).

element.name: TimetablePeriodIdentifier
element.desc: The unique identifier for the timetable period used for the bell period (from a TimetablePeriodList).

element.name: StartTime
element.desc: The starting time for the bell period.

element.name: EndTime
element.desc: The ending time for the bell period.

element.name: RegularSchoolPeriod
element.desc: Indicates if the bell period is part of the regular school day (i.e. is not a before or after school or break period).

element.name: InstructionalMinutes
element.desc: The number of minutes to be counted for instruction for the bell period.

element.name: UseInAttendanceCalculations
element.desc: Indicates if the bell period should be included in attendance calculations.

object.name: BellPeriodList
object.desc: The bell periods for this school year bell schedule.

element.name: BellPeriod
element.desc: An entry for each unique bell period for the bell schedule

object.name: BellSchedule
object.desc: This object provides the bell schedule information for a school and school year, including timetable days, periods and bell schedules.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The Id (GUID) that uniquely identifies the object.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: The Id (GUID) that uniquely identifies the school to which this bell schedule information applies

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., "2007" for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: BellScheduleName
element.desc: A name that uniquely identifies a particular BellSchedule from others for the same school and year.

element.name: TimetableDayList
element.desc: The timetable days for this school year bell schedule. This essentially provides a list of the time day identifiers that are used in the BellPeriod definitions below with some additional properties for each. The identifiers defined here may be referenced by other objects / elements like MeetingTime.

element.name: TimetablePeriodList
element.desc: The timetable periods for this school year bell schedule. This essentially provides a list of the time period identifiers that are used in the BellPeriod definitions below with some addition properties for each. The identifiers defined here may be referenced by other objects / elements like MeetingTime.

element.name: BellPeriodList
element.desc: The bell periods for this school year bell schedule.

element.name: BellScheduleRefId
element.desc: The GUID of a bell schedule to be utilized for the calendar date.

element.name: TimetableDayIdentifier
element.desc: The unique identifier of a timetable day to be utilized for the calendar date (from the list of timetable days defined for the calendar in the referenced BellSchedule object).

object.name: BellScheduleDayList
object.desc: A list of the bell schedules and the timetable day from that bell schedule to be used for the calendar date

object.name: CalendarDate
object.desc: This object defines information related to a school calendar day in a given school calendar year. If both CalendarDate and CalendarSummary objects are supported, there must be an instance of this object for each date between CalendarSummary StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.

attribute.name: Date
attribute.desc: A specific school day that occurs within the school year.

attribute.name: CalendarSummaryRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the calendar summary in which this calendar date is.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school for which this calendar information is being reported.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., "2007" for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: BellScheduleDayList
element.desc: A list of the bell schedules and the timetable day from that bell schedule to be used for the calendar date

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code indicating the type of school day.

value.name: MKUP
value.desc: Instructional day that is scheduled solely to make up for emergency days or early dismissal days.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the calendar to which this information relates.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school for which this calendar information is being reported.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., "2007" for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally assigned identifier for this calendar.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Textual description of the school calendar.

element.name: DaysInSession
element.desc: The total number of days that the school was or is anticipated to be in session during the school year. Also included are days on which the education institution facility is closed and the student body as a whole is engaged in planned activities off-campus under the guidance and direction of staff members.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: The first calendar date, whether or not instruction was provided. If both CalendarSummary and CalendarDate objects are supported, StartDate must be the date of the first chronological instance of CalendarDate for the school's calendar.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: The last calendar date, whether or not instruction was provided. If both CalendarSummary and CalendarDate objects are supported, EndDate must be the last chronological instance of CalendarDate for the school's calendar.

element.name: FirstInstructionDate
element.desc: The first day of student instruction.

element.name: LastInstructionDate
element.desc: The last day of student instruction (including days or times that students are present for purposes of testing and/or evaluation, but not including whole or part-days whose sole purposes is for distribution of report cards).

element.name: GraduationDate
element.desc: Date of graduation ceremony.

element.name: InstructionalMinutes
element.desc: The total number of instructional minutes for this calendar for the school year.

element.name: MinutesPerDay
element.desc: The number of minutes in the day in which the school is normally in session.

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Collection of grade levels applicable to this school calendar.

element.name: ParentLegalGuardian
element.desc: Does the individual have parental or legal guardianship responsibility for the student?

element.name: PickupRights
element.desc: This element tells whether or not the contact has pickup rights.

element.name: LivesWith
element.desc: Does the student live with this contact?

element.name: AccessToRecords
element.desc: Does this contact have access to the student's records?

element.name: EmergencyContact
element.desc: Should this contact be notified in case of emergency?

element.name: HasCustody
element.desc: Does this contact have or share custody of the student?

element.name: DisciplinaryContact
element.desc: Is this person to be contacted in case of disciplinary action?

element.name: PrimaryCareProvider
element.desc: Does this person provide daily living or personal assistance to the student?

element.name: Other
element.desc: This person has a relationship to student(s) that the school needs to document but no other contact flag value is 'Yes'. An example is a parent who enrolled the student but is deceased and is no longer a valid contact

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: The type of credit offered

object.name: CreditsAttempted
object.desc: Number of credits the student is attempting to earn. If present, this element's value overrides the credits in SchoolCourseInfo and SectionInfo.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The unique identifier (GUID) of this discipline incident.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year in which the incident occurred, and for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., "2007" for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: IncidentNumber
element.desc: The locally-defined unique identifier (within the school or school district) to identify this specific incident or occurrence.

element.name: IncidentDate
element.desc: The date when the incident occurred.

element.name: IncidentTime
element.desc: The time when the incident occurred.

element.name: IncidentLocation
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier or description of the location where the incident occurred.

element.name: IncidentCost
element.desc: If the incident resulted in a quantifiable monetary loss for any entity involved, identify and record the value of that loss. Cost may be reported by specific dollar amount or range.

element.name: WeaponTypeList
element.desc: List of weapons involved in the incident. If the incident involves weapons, the element must have a value. Each weapon used in the incident is identified by a WeaponType entry. When multiple weapons of a single type are used, each weapon has a separate entry in this list. Weapons used by individual offenders are also reported in WeaponTypeList entries associated to the offender.

element.name: IncidentDescription
element.desc: If the incident resulted in a quantifiable monetary loss for any entity involved, identify and record the value of that loss. Cost may be reported by specific dollar amount or range.

element.name: IncidentActionList
element.desc: If the incident resulted in a quantifiable monetary loss for any entity involved, identify and record the value of that loss. Cost may be reported by specific dollar amount or range.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code indicating the operational/administrative level.

value.name: 1151_3487_SCHOOL_DISTRICT_UNION
value.desc: School district that is a component of a supervisory union

value.name: REG_DISTRICT
value.desc: Regular local school district that is not a component of a supervisory union. This category includes both independent school districts and those that are a dependent segment of a local government such as a city or county. INCLUDE agencies that do not operate schools (non-ops) but have primary responsibility to provide free public elementary and/or secondary education to school-age children within their jurisdictions.

value.name: SUPERVISED_DISTRICT
value.desc: Local school district that is a component of a supervisory union. A superintendent and administrative services are shared with other local school districts. Each agency given this code should have an entry in the Supervisory Union Identification Number field corresponding to the appropriate type 3 or type 4 agency. Non-ops in supervisory unions should be included in this category.

value.name: SUPERVISORY_UNION
value.desc: Supervisory union administrative center, or county superintendentâ€™s office serving the same purposes. Each agency given this code should have an entry in the Supervisory Union Identification Number data field. Student and staff data reported elsewhere should NOT be duplicated in records carrying this code.

value.name: REGIONAL_AGENCY
value.desc: Regional education services agency (RESA). Agencies created for the purposes of providing specialized educational services to other education agencies. Student and staff data reported elsewhere should NOT be duplicated in records carrying this code.

value.name: STATE_AGENCY
value.desc: State agency charged with providing elementary and/or secondary level instruction to school-age children in a specified population, e.g., agency responsible for state schools for blind or deaf students, correctional facilities, and state hospitals.

value.name: FEDERAL_AGENCY
value.desc: Federal agency charged with providing elementary and/or secondary level instruction to school-age children in a specified population.

value.name: OTHER_AGENCY
value.desc: Other education agencies that do not fit into the first six categories.

element.name: SchoolName
element.desc: Name of the school.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: Provide both the HomeEnrollment/SchoolId and HomeEnrollment/LocalId elements if possible. If not, one or the other must be provided.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier for this school. Provide both the HomeEnrollment/LocalId and HomeEnrollment/SchoolId elements if possible. If not, one or the other must be provided.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state or province defined identifier for this school.

element.name: Status
element.desc: Enrollment status as of the SnapDate.

element.name: GradeLevel
element.desc: Grade or academic level of student.

element.name: HomeroomNumber
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier for this room.

element.name: FullYearEnrollment
element.desc: An indication as to whether or not the student was enrolled for the whole school year. If the SchoolYear is in progress as of the SnapDate, use the value "Unknown".

object.name: Homeroom
object.desc: The GUID of the RoomInfo referenced by this enrollment.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: The name of the object referenced.

object.name: IncidentAction
object.desc: Information regarding the action(s) taken in response to the incident.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: The date on which the action begins.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: The date through which the action is in effect, inclusive.

element.name: Duration
element.desc: Identifies the length, in school days, of the action. Note: decimal places may be used for fractions of school days.

element.name: ZeroTolerance
element.desc: Identifies whether or not this action was imposed as a consequence of state or local zero tolerance policies.

element.name: PoliceNotification
element.desc: Identifies whether there was notification of local law enforcement, regardless of whether official action was taken.

element.name: Arrest
element.desc: Identifies whether there were any arrests.

object.name: IncidentActionList
object.desc: List of actions taken on the incident, regardless of actions relating to individual offenders.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Identifies the type of incident being reported.

element.name: OtherCodeList
element.desc: List of other codes or strings that crosswalk to or serve as translations of the Code element. If Code changes and OtherCode elements are supported, both Code and all associated OtherCode elements must be present.

element.name: CodeComment
element.desc: A short comment clarifying the discipline code (e.g. for Nonsexual Harassment could detail "Racial comment, pushing, name-calling" or "Cell phone violation. Second offense.")

value.name: 1049_1000_ALCOHOL
value.desc: Alcohol (liquor law violations: possession, use, sale)
Attendance Policy Violation (Not Attending School or Classes as Required)
Drugs Excluding Alcohol and Tobacco (Illegal Drug Possession, Sale, Use/Under the Influence)
Sale of substance represented as an illegal drug
Distribution of substance represented as an illegal drug
Inappropriate Use of Medication (Prescription or over-the-counter)
Use of medication in violation of school rules
Possession of medication in violation of school rules
Suspicion of use of medication in violation of school rules
Displays of affection in violation of school policy
School Threat (Threat of Destruction or Harm)
Sexual Offenses, Other (Lewd Behavior, Indecent Exposure)
Vandalism (Damage to School or Personal Property)
Violation of School Rules (Disobeying School Policy)

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Identifies where the incident occurred.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: The name of the SIF object to which the GUID relates.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the individual reporting the incident.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Identifies whether or not the incident occurred during school hours.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code representing the language of instruction.

element.name: PublishInDirectory
element.desc: Indicates whether or not this LEA contact's information should be published in a directory of LEA information.

element.name: LEAContact
element.desc: Information on contact persons for this LEA.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the LEA whose information this is.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this LEA.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this LEA.

element.name: NCESId
element.desc: The NCES-assigned identifier for this LEA.

element.name: LEAName
element.desc: Name of LEA.

element.name: LEAURL
element.desc: URL for the LEA.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The LEA's phone number(s).

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The LEA's address(es).

element.name: IdentificationInfoList
element.desc: Other identification information associated with an LEA, such as the locally-defined code/identifier, etc.

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Collection of grade levels offered in this LEA.

element.name: OperationalStatus
element.desc: Operational condition of an LEA.

element.name: CongressionalDistrict
element.desc: Number for the US congressional district where the LEA is located.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code representing the location of instruction.

element.name: MeetingHeld
element.desc: Was a manifestation determination meeting held for this student regarding this offense?

element.name: MeetingDate
element.desc: Date of the manifestation determination meeting, if applicable.

element.name: DueToDisability
element.desc: Did the team determine that the offense was a manifestation of the student's disability?

element.name: MeetingOutcome
element.desc: Text description of the outcome of the meeting: for example, hearing completed, pending, or refused by student's parents.

attribute.name: Severity
attribute.desc: The level of severity of this medical alert.

element.name: MedicalAlertMessage
element.desc: Medical alert associated with the student.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code representing the medium of instruction.

element.name: SchoolLocalId
element.desc: Local identifier representing the school in which the student is or was most recently enrolled in the district.

element.name: HomeroomLocalId
element.desc: Local identifier representing the current or most recent homeroom in which the student is or was most recently assigned in the district. Use the value from RoomInfo/HomeroomNumber if supported. If not supported, use the value from RoomInfo/RoomNumber. If neither is supported, use the most appropriate value from the agentâ€™s application.

element.name: GradeLevel
element.desc: The current or most recent grade level of the student in the district.

object.name: Nonpromotion
object.desc: This element is mutually exclusive with Promotion, and its child elements should only be populated if the value of PromotionStatus is "Retained" or "Demoted".

element.name: Code
element.desc: The reason the student was not promoted. This element should only be populated if the value of PromotionStatus is "Promoted".

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Identifies the type of offender involved in the incident.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the offender.

element.name: Injury
element.desc: Identifies whether or not this specific offender was physically injured, and if so, identifies whether the injury was major or minor.

element.name: ActionList
element.desc: List of actions taken. Note: There is also a SIF type called ActionList. It is one of two types of lists. Do not confuse this element with the SIF type called ActionList. This problem will be resolved in the next major release.

element.name: WeaponTypeList
element.desc: List of weapons involved in the incident used by the offender. If the incident involves weapons, the element must have a value. Each weapon used by the offender is identified by a WeaponType entry. When multiple weapons of a single type are used by the offender, each weapon has a separate entry in this list. (Note: All weapons used in the incident are reported in WeaponTypeList entries for the incident, including those weapons related to this offender.)

element.name: RelatedToList
element.desc: List of categories to which the offenderâ€™s incident is related.

value.name: SCHOOL_OPEN
value.desc: School Open: School is currently in operation with no significant change in instructional levels and programs.

value.name: SCHOOL_CLOSED
value.desc: School Closed: School is not currently open in operation and is not expected to operate in the future.

value.name: SCHOOL_INACTIVE
value.desc: School Inactive: School is temporarily closed (e.g. under construction) and may reopen within three years.

value.name: SCHOOL_NEW
value.desc: New School: School is newly created or completely restructured into the instructional levels and programs that are currently in operation.

value.name: SCHOOL_FUTURE
value.desc: Future School: School is scheduled to be operational within two years.

value.name: AGENCY_CHANGED
value.desc: Changed Agency: School is affiliated with another agency although the internal organization and instructional level have not changed.

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: The name of the object reference.

element.name: ContactName
element.desc: The name of the principal.

element.name: ContactTitle
element.desc: The principal's title.

object.name: Promotion
object.desc: This element is mutually exclusive with Nonpromotion, and its child elements should only be populated if the value of PromotionStatus is "Promoted".

element.name: Code
element.desc: The reason the student was promoted. This element should only be populated if the value of PromotionStatus is "Promoted".

object.name: PromotionInfo
object.desc: Information on a studentâ€™s promotion, retention, or demotion related to this enrollment instance.

element.name: PromotionStatus
element.desc: This value should be set if this enrollment instance is closed for an end-of-year closeout or a mid-year promotion or demotion. A value other than NA should be specified when the enrollment instance represents an end-of-year closeout or mid-year promotion/demotion.

element.name: Promotion
element.desc: This element is mutually exclusive with Nonpromotion, and its child elements should only be populated if the value of PromotionStatus is "Promoted".

element.name: Nonpromotion
element.desc: This element is mutually exclusive with Promotion, and its child elements should only be populated if the value of PromotionStatus is "Retained" or "Demoted".

element.name: RelatedTo
element.desc: Identifies if incident was related to a specific category.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this room.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the school that this room belongs to.

element.name: RoomNumber
element.desc: Room number as presented to the user/application.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Friendly name that can be assigned to the room (e.g. Staff Cafeteria).

element.name: Building
element.desc: Extra building information. In the future Building could become its own object in which case this element will need to be changed to a RefId. Currently it is only required as a free text field.

element.name: HomeroomNumber
element.desc: When a room is designated as a homeroom it may have a different number. Usually blank when room is not a homeroom.

element.name: Size
element.desc: Size in square feet.

element.name: Capacity
element.desc: Number of persons (usually students) that this room can hold.

element.name: PhoneNumber
element.desc: Phone number for the room

element.name: RoomTypeRefId
element.desc: GUID that identifies the room type assigned to this room.

object.name: RoomInfoRefId
object.desc: The ID (GUID) of the room in which this section is taught

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies this room type.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the school that this room type belongs to.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of the room type.

element.name: CourseLevel
element.desc: Conveys the level of the course.

element.name: AvailableCredit
element.desc: Identifies the amount of credit available to a student who successfully meets the objectives of the course, measured in Carnegie units (9.99 format).

element.name: SequenceNumber
element.desc: One-digit number describing where a specific course lies when it is part of a consecutive sequence of courses described by the same general course description.

element.name: SequenceLimit
element.desc: One-digit number representing the total number of courses in the consecutive sequence described by the same general course description.

attribute.name: TermInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The schedule-related information for a section repeating for each term in which the section is scheduled. The TermInfoRefId attribute value should repeat as necessary to show the appropriate relationship between meeting times, teachers and rooms.

attribute.name: Override
attribute.desc: Designates whether or not scheduling information has been overridden with different values for this student.

attribute.name: TermInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the term to which this override information relates for this student.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the school course.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the course is offered.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: CourseCode
element.desc: School-defined local code for the course.

element.name: StateCourseCode
element.desc: State-defined standard course code used to report information about courses.

element.name: DistrictCourseCode
element.desc: The corresponding district course code.

element.name: CourseTitle
element.desc: Title of the course.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Textual description of the course.

element.name: InstructionalLevel
element.desc: An indication of the general nature and difficulty of instruction provided.

element.name: CourseCredits
element.desc: The number of credits awarded upon course completion.

element.name: CoreAcademicCourse
element.desc: Does the course meet the state definition of a core academic course?

element.name: GraduationRequirement
element.desc: Does the state require that the course be completed for graduation?

element.name: SCEDCode
element.desc: Course code from the School Codes for the Exchange of Data that describes the course content.

object.name: SchoolCourseInfoOverride
object.desc: Optional overrides of the course information for a section

attribute.name: Override
attribute.desc: Designates whether or not SchoolCourseInfo information has been overridden with different values for this section

element.name: CourseCode
element.desc: Override of the school-defined course code for this section.

element.name: StateCourseCode
element.desc: Override of the state-defined course code for this section.

element.name: DistrictCourseCode
element.desc: Override of the district course code for this section.

element.name: SubjectArea
element.desc: Override of the subject matter area for this section.

element.name: CourseTitle
element.desc: Override of the course title for this section.

element.name: InstructionalLevel
element.desc: Override of the instructional level for this section.

element.name: CourseCredits
element.desc: Override of the course credits for this section.

element.name: SchoolFocus
element.desc: The type of educational institution as classified by its focus.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID that identifies this school.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this school.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this school.

element.name: NCESId
element.desc: The NCES-assigned identifier for this school.

element.name: SchoolName
element.desc: Name of school.

element.name: LEAInfoRefId
element.desc: School district of which this school is a member.

element.name: OtherLEA
element.desc: Other related education agency, such as a regional service agency.

element.name: SchoolType
element.desc: An indication of the level of the educational institution.

element.name: SchoolURL
element.desc: URL for the school.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The school's addresses.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The school's phone numbers.

element.name: IdentificationInfoList
element.desc: Other identification information associated with a school, such as the locally-defined code/identifier, etc.

element.name: SessionType
element.desc: Code that specifies the session type.

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Collection of grade levels offered in this school.

element.name: Title1Status
element.desc: Status of the school's Title I eligibility. Certain schools are designated under appropriate state and federal regulations as being eligible for participation in programs authorized by Title I of Public Law 103-382.

element.name: OperationalStatus
element.desc: Operational condition of a school.

element.name: CongressionalDistrict
element.desc: Number for the US congressional district of the school location.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this section entity.

attribute.name: SchoolCourseInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the course being taught in this section.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this course section.

element.name: Description
element.desc: Description of the course section.

element.name: SummerSchool
element.desc: Is this a summer school assignment?

element.name: CourseSectionCode
element.desc: A section code that is linked to a course. This should be a unique identifier within the school year and course (i.e. the class instance number for a course). For example, Algebra I: Section 23 is different from English II: Section 23.

element.name: SectionCode
element.desc: A unique identifier of the section for the school year and across courses (i.e. unique across all courses). For example, Algebra I sections range from 00122 to 00140 and English II courses range from 00141 to 00152.

element.name: CountForAttendance
element.desc: Indicates if attendance in this section is collected and used in attendance calculations.

element.name: BellScheduleRefId
element.desc: The GUID of the bell schedule used by this section.

element.name: RoomInfoRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the room in which this section is taught

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID that uniquely identifies a particular staff assignment.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the staff member is assigned.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

attribute.name: StaffPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: ID (GUID) of this staff member, as represented in the StaffPersonal object.Â

element.name: Description
element.desc: Short assignment description

element.name: PrimaryAssignment
element.desc: Is this the staff member's primary assignment? Note: There must be one and only one instance of the object with a Yes value in this element per school year.

element.name: JobStartDate
element.desc: This is the date from which the staff assignment is valid (inclusive).

element.name: JobEndDate
element.desc: This is the date through which the staff assignment is valid (inclusive).

element.name: JobFTE
element.desc: Full-time job equivalent ratio for this assignment. (Format is x.xx; an employee who is full-time and who is 50% of their time on this assignment would be represented as 0.50)

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: An indication of the grade level(s) the individual is assigned

element.name: ItinerantTeacher
element.desc: Is this staff itinerant for this assignment?

element.name: InstructionalLevel
element.desc: An indication of the general nature of instruction provided throughout a course.

element.name: EmployeePersonalRefId
element.desc: A GUID referencing an EmployeePersonal object to be able to establish a link between HR employee objects and SIS staff objects.

element.name: StaffPersonalRefId
element.desc: Staff assigned to this room. For example, the homeroom teacher.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the staff member.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this staff member.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this staff member.

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: Electronic identifier(s) associated with this entity.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: Lists all "other" identifiers associated with the staff member.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the staff member. Note: Always use Type value of 04.

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: This element contains information related to staff member demographics.

element.name: Title
element.desc: The staff member's title.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The staff member's address(es).

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The staff member's phone number(s).

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: The staff member's e-mail address(es).

element.name: EmployeePersonalRefId
element.desc: Allows for a linkage to the HR/Fin EmployeePersonal object.

attribute.name: PickupOrDropoff
attribute.desc: Specifies if this is a pickup or dropoff address. This property may be needed by a transportation application.

attribute.name: DayOfWeek
attribute.desc: This attribute indicates the days of the week for which the pickup or dropoff address is valid. The attribute if relevant only if the value of the PickupOrDropoff attribute is "Pickup," "Dropoff" or "Both."

element.name: Address
element.desc: This is the actual address.

object.name: StudentAddressList
object.desc: A student address

element.name: Address
element.desc: The street address

element.name: CountsTowardAttendance
element.desc: Designates whether this date should be counted toward student attendance.

element.name: AttendanceValue
element.desc: Amount of the school day in which the student should be in attendance (Format is x.x; a student who should be in attendance a full day would be represented as 1.0). If StudentAttendance is present, StudentAttendanceValue must also be present. If StudentAttendance equals "Yes" then StudentAttendanceValue must be greater than zero.

object.name: StudentAttendanceSummary
object.desc: This object provides a summary of a student's daily attendance and membership information for a given school during the time period between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. As such, there may be multiple instances of this object for a student in a school over the course of a school year or reporting period.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student for whom this attendance information is being reported.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school for which this attendance information is being reported.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: The starting date on which the information in this object instance is applicable.

element.name: StartDay
element.desc: Number of the first school day to which this object instance applies.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: The ending date on which the information in this object instance is applicable.

element.name: EndDay
element.desc: Number of the last school day to which this object instance applies.

element.name: Resident
element.desc:
An indication as to whether or not the student's legal residence was within the boundaries of the school during the time between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.
Note: No SIF_Query SIF_Condition support is required for this element.

element.name: FTE
element.desc:
Full time equivalent numeric value of the student's course load during the time between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. Expressed in decimal form, where 1.00 represents a full time enrollment.
Deprecated in favor of using the StudentSchoolEnrollmentRefId element below.

element.name: DaysAttended
element.desc:
The number of days the student attended school when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.
Note: No SIF_Query SIF_Condition support is required for this element.

element.name: ExcusedAbsences
element.desc:
The number of days the student was absent from school with a valid excuse when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.
Note: No SIF_Query SIF_Condition support is required for this element.

element.name: UnexcusedAbsences
element.desc:
The number of days the student was absent from school without a valid excuse when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.
Note: No SIF_Query SIF_Condition support is required for this element.

element.name: DaysTardy
element.desc: The number of days the student was tardy when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.

element.name: DaysInMembership
element.desc:
The number of days the student was present plus the number of days the student was absent when school was in session during the period between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive.
Note: No SIF_Query SIF_Condition support is required for this element.

element.name: StudentSchoolEnrollmentRefId
element.desc: RefId (GUID) of the StudentSchoolEnrollment object instance that corresponds to this object instance.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of this contact.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student whose contact this is.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this contact. Note: LocalId may be used as a unique person identifier rather than a unique contact identifier. In this case there may be more than one StudentContact instance with the same LocalId.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: Lists all "other" IDs associated with the contact.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the contact. Note: Always use Type attribute value of 04.

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: Demographic information about the contact.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The contact's address(es).

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The contact's phone number(s).

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: The contact's e-mail address(es).

element.name: Relationship
element.desc: Defines the relationship of the contact to the student.

element.name: EmployerType
element.desc: Code that defines the employer type.

element.name: EducationalLevel
element.desc: The highest level of education completed by the contact person.

element.name: ContactSequence
element.desc: Number indicating the order in which the person should be contacted.

object.name: StudentContactPersonal
object.desc: Demographic and other information for each person who might be referenced as a student contact.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The Id (GUID) that uniquely identifies the instance of the object.

element.name: PersonInfo
element.desc: Common element containing person demographic information.

element.name: EmployerType
element.desc: Code that defines the employer type.

element.name: EducationLevel
element.desc: The highest level of education completed by the contact person.

element.name: OptOutEmail
element.desc: A "yes" value indicates person may only be contacted as authorized via email. This usually indicates they have requested contact be limited to essential purposes and use/release of their contact information (e.g. to Parent Teacher organizations) may be limited.

object.name: StudentContactRelationship
object.desc: The relationship between a student and a contact person.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the student for the relationship.

attribute.name: StudentContactPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: GUID that identifies the contact person for the relationship.

element.name: Relationship
element.desc: The relationship of the contact person to the student

element.name: ContactFlags
element.desc: Contains Yes/No characteristics of the contact person's role. Provide a Yes value for all that apply. At least one of the child elements of ContactFlags must have a Yes value.

element.name: ContactSequence
element.desc: Number indicating the order in which the person should be contacted.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student for whom this attendance information is being reported.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school for which this attendance information is being reported.

attribute.name: Date
attribute.desc: The calendar date to which this attendance information relates.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which this enrollment is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: AttendanceCodeInfoRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the locally-defined daily attendance code information.

element.name: TimeIn
element.desc: The time the student entered or returned to school.

element.name: TimeOut
element.desc: The time the student left school.

element.name: AttendanceNote
element.desc: Note related to this particular attendance.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The GUID of the student.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this student.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this student.

element.name: ElectronicIdList
element.desc: Electronic identifier(s) associated with this entity.

element.name: OtherIdList
element.desc: Lists all "other" IDs associated with the student.

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of the student. Note: Always use Type value of 04.

element.name: Demographics
element.desc: This element contains information related to student demographics.

element.name: AddressList
element.desc: The student's address(es)

element.name: StudentAddress
element.desc: This element has the student's address information.

element.name: PhoneNumberList
element.desc: The student's phone number(s).

element.name: EmailList
element.desc: The student's e-mail address(es).

element.name: ProjectedGraduationYear
element.desc: Currently projected graduation year.

element.name: OnTimeGraduationYear
element.desc: First projected graduation year, usually determined when student is accepted into 9th grade.

element.name: GraduationDate
element.desc: First projected graduation year, usually determined when student is accepted into 9th grade.

element.name: AcceptableUsePolicy
element.desc: Does the student have a current signed Acceptable Use Policy document for system access?

element.name: FirstUSEnrollment
element.desc: The date on which the student was first enrolled in the US school system.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: This is the GUID of the student whose picture this is.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which this enrollment is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: PictureSource
element.desc: This element defines the picture. If the Type attribute is URL, this is the location of the picture in [JPEG] format; if Type is JPEG, this is the [JPEG] image data encoded using the Base64 Content-Transfer-Encoding defined in Section 6.8 of [RFC 2045].

element.name: OKToPublish
element.desc: Can the picture be published?

object.name: StudentSchoolEnrollment
object.desc: This object defines information related to a student's enrollment. SIF_Events are reported. StudentSchoolEnrollment instances must not span multiple school years.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies a particular enrollment.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student to whom this information is linked.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school to which this enrollment applies.

attribute.name: MembershipType
attribute.desc: The type of this enrollment as it relates to the school identified in SchoolInfoRefId.

attribute.name: TimeFrame
attribute.desc: The timeframe of the enrollment based on the SIF_Date in the SIF_Header of the message. For events, it is determined as of the date the event is generated. For requests and responses, it is calculated based on the date of the request.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which this enrollment is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year). StudentSchoolEnrollment instances must not span multiple school years.

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: The date from when this enrollment is valid.

element.name: GradeLevel
element.desc: Grade or academic level of student for this enrollment.

element.name: Advisor
element.desc: Staff member assigned as an advisor for this enrollment.

element.name: Counselor
element.desc: Staff member assigned as a counselor for this enrollment.

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: The last School calendar day (membership day) the student was enrolled in the school (inclusive). If the student has existed the school, ExitDate must have a value.

element.name: FTE
element.desc: Full-time equivalent numeric value of the student's course load during this enrollment, expressed in decimal form, where 1.00 represents a full-time enrollment.

element.name: FTPTStatus
element.desc: An indication of whether the student is enrolled full time or part time.

element.name: NonResidentAttendReason
element.desc: If the school represented by this enrollment is outside of the student's usual attendance area (as indicated in the ResidencyStatus element), this element indicates the reason that the student attends this school.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this StudentSectionEnrollment entity.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student to whom the enrollment information applies.

attribute.name: SectionInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the section in which this student is enrolled.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: Date from when this course section enrollment is valid.

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: The last school calendar day (membership day) the student was enrolled in the course section (inclusive).

attribute.name: SnapDate
attribute.desc: The date the data snapshot was taken. Some elements are provided/calculated as of the SnapDate, and some are provided as of the date the object is requested (i.e., some can be historical and some will represent the last information available/last known value). In a SIS the following elements are provided/calculated as of the SnapDate: Age, HomeEnrollment and all its child elements. Other applications (e.g., data warehouses) may be able to provide values for other elements on various snap dates.

attribute.name: StudentPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the student to whom this information relates.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year in which the SnapDate falls, and for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the student.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-defined identifier for this student.

element.name: StateProvinceId
element.desc: The state-assigned identifier for this student.

element.name: Address
element.desc: The address of the student.

element.name: RaceList
element.desc: Person's race

element.name: Gender
element.desc: Person's gender.

element.name: BirthDate
element.desc: The person's date of birth.

element.name: Age
element.desc: The age (in years) of the student on the date in SnapDate.

element.name: ProjectedGraduationYear
element.desc: Currently projected graduation year.

element.name: OnTimeGraduationYear
element.desc: First projected graduation year, usually determined when student is accepted into ninth grade.

element.name: GraduationDate
element.desc: Date student officially graduated from secondary education.

element.name: GraduationAward
element.desc: The award received upon graduation.

element.name: GraduationOnTime
element.desc: Did the student graduate in the expected number of years?

element.name: FreeAndReducedStatus
element.desc: Student's eligibility for free and reduced meals.

element.name: CountsTowardAttendance
element.desc: Designates whether this date should be counted toward teacher attendance.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code representing the type of teaching assignment.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this TermInfo entity.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that identifies the school where the term is used.

attribute.name: SchoolYear
attribute.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g., 2007 for the 2006-07 school year).

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Starting date of the term.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Ending date of the term (CCYYMMDD).

element.name: Description
element.desc: Text-based description of the term.

element.name: TermCode
element.desc: Locally-defined code.

element.name: Track
element.desc: The name, description, or code of the track that contains this term. This is used when there are multiple tracks within a school. For instance, kindergarten commonly has a different set of terms than other grades within the school.

element.name: MarkingTerm
element.desc: Does this TermInfo represent a marking period?

element.name: SchedulingTerm
element.desc: Does this TermInfo represent a scheduling term?

element.name: AttendanceTerm
element.desc: Does this TermInfo represent an attendance term?

value.name: CURRENT
value.desc: Event/request date falls between EntryDate and ExitDate (inclusive)

object.name: TimetableDay
object.desc: An entry for each unique timetable day

element.name: Identifier
element.desc: The unique identifier for the timetable day for this school calendar.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the timetable day.

object.name: TimetableDayList
object.desc: The timetable days for this school year bell schedule. This essentially provides a list of the time day identifiers that are used in the BellPeriod definitions below with some additional properties for each. The identifiers defined here may be referenced by other objects / elements like MeetingTime.

element.name: TimetableDay
element.desc: An entry for each unique timetable day

object.name: TimetablePeriod
object.desc: An entry for each unique timetable period

element.name: Identifier
element.desc: The unique identifier for the timetable period for this school calendar.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the timetable period.

object.name: TimetablePeriodList
object.desc: The timetable periods for this school year bell schedule. This essentially provides a list of the time period identifiers that are used in the BellPeriod definitions below with some addition properties for each. The identifiers defined here may be referenced by other objects / elements like MeetingTime.

element.name: TimetablePeriod
element.desc: An entry for each unique timetable period

value.name: TARGETED
value.desc: Certain students enrolled in the school are eligible for Title I programs

value.name: SCHOOLWIDE
value.desc: All students in the school are eligible for Title I programs

value.name: NA
value.desc: Not applicable, school is not eligible for Title I programs

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Identifies the type of individual victimized in the incident.

element.name: Name
element.desc: The name of the victim.

element.name: Injury
element.desc: Identifies whether or not this specific victim was physically injured, and if so, identify whether the injury was major or minor.

value.name: 0021_KNIFE_LESS_2_5
value.desc: Knife with blade less than 2.5 inches

value.name: 0023_KNIFE_GREATER_2_5
value.desc: Knife with blade greater than or equal to 2.5 inches

element.name: WeaponType
element.desc: Identifies the type of weapon used during an incident.

object.name: StudentActivityInfo
object.desc: Co-curricular or extra-curricular activities (e.g., student organizations, intramural and interscholastic athletes, publications, band, orchestra, and service activities) in which students may participate.

element.name: Title
element.desc: Name of the co-curricular or extra-curricular activity.

element.name: Description
element.desc: The description of the co-curricular or extra-curricular activity.

element.name: StudentActivityLevel
element.desc: A description of the separation of level in the activity.

element.name: GradeLevels
element.desc: Collection of grade levels applicable to this co-curricular or extra-curricular activity.

element.name: CurricularStatus
element.desc: An indication of the degree to which an activity is related to a student's curriculum.

element.name: Location
element.desc: Location where the activity takes place.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code identifying the co-curricular or extra-curricular activity.

object.name: StudentActivityParticipation
object.desc: The co-curricular or extra-curricular activity in which the student participates.

element.name: ParticipationComment
element.desc: Comment related to the student's participation in the activity.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: This is the date which the activity participation is valid (inclusive).

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: This is the date through which the activity participation is valid (inclusive). If element is supported by the publisher/responder, should contain a date if the student withdraws from the activity before the end of the school year.

element.name: Role
element.desc: Specific role the student plays in the activity (e.g., band leader, student body president).

attribute.name: Code
attribute.desc: Code identifying the co-curricular or extra-curricular activity.

attribute.name: Type
attribute.desc: Values: Classroom, School, District, Campus, IntermediateUnit, StateEducationAgency

element.name: LocationName
element.desc: Name of the location

attribute.name: SIF_RefObject
attribute.desc: Type of SIF object Location points to.

object.name: StudentGrade
object.desc: This object contains the final grade for a student in a section.

element.name: StudentPersonalRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the StudentPersonal object that this item refers to.

element.name: SectionInfoRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the SectionInfo object that this item refers to.

element.name: SchoolInfoRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the school that these values apply to.

object.name: Grade
object.desc: This object contains the final grade for a student in a section.

element.name: Percentage
element.desc: The grade percentage for this grade (0.00-100.00).

element.name: Numeric
element.desc: The raw numeric value for this grade. If this is provided, the

element.name: OutOf
element.desc: his is the high value equivalent to 100% without extra points or extra credit (e.g. if a student received 3.5 out of 4, 4 would be the

element.name: Low
element.desc: Lowest grade value in the range for the numeric grade.

element.name: High
element.desc: Highest grade value in the range for the numeric grade. NOTE: This could be higher than the

element.name: Letter
element.desc: The letter grade value for this grade. If this is provided, the numeric value or percentage value must also be entered in order to provide a numeric value for the grade to be utilized in any computations.

element.name: Narrative
element.desc: The free form text narrative for this grade.
